typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT  [Building_ExternalBuildingId]
      ,[Building_BuildingName_local]
      ,[Building_BuildingName_en]
      ,[Building_Height]
      ,[Building_StreetAddress_En]
      ,[Building_StreetAddress_Local]
      ,[Building_Suburb_En]
      ,[Building_Suburb_Local]
      ,[Building_City_En]
      ,[Building_City_Local]
      ,[Building_Postcode]
      ,[Building_MainTypeViewId]
      ,[Building_MainTypeName_En]
      ,[Building_MainTypeName_Local]
      ,[Building_SubTypeViewId]
      ,[Building_SubTypeName_En]
      ,[Building_SubTypeName_Local]
      ,[Building_BuildingNo]
      ,[Building_IsStandbybuilding]
      ,[Building_CostingNo]
      ,[Building_CustomerNo]
      ,[Building_SumOfTotalUnits]
      ,[Building_SumOfUnitsInService]
      ,[Building_QuickTurnover]
      ,[Building_Latitude]
      ,[Building_Longitude]
      ,[Building_OfficeViewId]
      ,[Building_OfficeName_En]
      ,[Building_OfficeName_Local]
      ,[Building_TKManagerEmployeeViewId]
      ,[Building_TKManagerEmployeeExternalId]
      ,[Building_TKManagerName]
      ,[Building_IsRepairCorres]
      ,[Building_IsCalendar]
      ,[Building_IsGeneralCorres]
      ,[Building_IsCard]
      ,[Building_IsMonthlyReport]
      ,[Building_UnitsScheduleHours]
      ,[Building_UnitsScheduleHoursViewId]
      ,[Building_UnitsScheduleTime]
      ,[Building_UnitsScheduleTimeViewId]
      ,[Building_UnitsScheduleDay]
      ,[Building_UnitsScheduleDayViewId]
      ,[Building_UnitsScheduleDayFrequency]
      ,[Building_TargetCallRate]
      ,[Array_RunInfo]
      ,[RunInfo_RunTypeViewId]
      ,[RunInfo_RunTypeName]
      ,[RunInfo_RunViewId]
      ,[RunInfo_RunName]
      ,[RunInfo_BHSWPResponse]
      ,[RunInfo_BHStopResponse]
      ,[RunInfo_BHOthersResponse]
      ,[RunInfo_AHSWPResponse]
      ,[RunInfo_AHStopResponse]
      ,[RunInfo_AHOthersResponse]
      ,[RunInfo_Notes]
      ,[RunInfo_PropertyManagerEmployeeViewId]
      ,[RunInfo_PropertyManagerEmployeeName]
      ,[Array_BusinessHourContactInfo]
      ,[BusinessHourContactInfo_BHSiteContact]
      ,[BusinessHourContactInfo_BHContactLocation_En]
      ,[BusinessHourContactInfo_BHContactLocation_Local]
      ,[BusinessHourContactInfo_BHContactPhone1]
      ,[BusinessHourContactInfo_BHContactPhone2]
      ,[BusinessHourContactInfo_BHContactMobile]
      ,[BusinessHourContactInfo_BHContactFax]
      ,[BusinessHourContactInfo_BHContactRoleViewId]
      ,[BusinessHourContactInfo_BHContactRoleName]
      ,[Array_AfterHourContactInfo]
      ,[AfterHourContactInfo_AHSiteContact]
      ,[AfterHourContactInfo_AHContactLocation_En]
      ,[AfterHourContactInfo_AHContactLocation_Local]
      ,[AfterHourContactInfo_AHContactPhone1]
      ,[AfterHourContactInfo_AHContactMobile]
      ,[AfterHourContactInfo_AHContactFax]
      ,[AfterHourContactInfo_AHContactRoleViewId]
      ,[AfterHourContactInfo_AHContactRoleViewName]
      ,[AfterHourContactInfo_AHContactAccessCode]
      ,[Array_BuildingContactInfo]
      ,[BuildingContactInfo_ContactViewId]
      ,[BuildingContactInfo_ContactExternalId]
      ,[BuildingContactInfo_ContactName]
      ,[BuildingContactInfo_IsBusinessHours]
      ,[Building_VFMCustomerName_En]
      ,[Building_VFMCustomerName_Local]
      ,[Building_VFMCustomerMail]
      ,[Building_VFMMailTemplateSubject]
      ,[Building_VFMMailTemplateContent]
      ,[Building_IsCustomisedMail]
      ,[Building_ReportFrequencyViewId]
      ,[Building_ReportFrequency]
      ,[Building_ReportTypeViewId]
      ,[Building_ReportType]
      ,[Building_IsReportInvoice]
      ,[Building_ReportSendTo]
      ,[Building_ReportAuditRequired]
      ,[Building_ReportAuditDetail]
      ,[Building_ReportServiceDockets]
      ,[Building_FromProjectId]
      ,[Building_FromProjectLabel]
      ,[Array_BuildingCustomerInfo]
      ,[BuildingCustomerInfo_CustomerViewId]
      ,[BuildingCustomerInfo_CustomerExternalId]
      ,[BuildingCustomerInfo_CustomerName]
      ,[Array_State]
      ,[State_ViewId]
      ,[State_Name]
      ,[Builiding_TimeZone]
      ,[Builiding_CustomerCode]
  FROM [customer].[Building] FOR JSON AUTO',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
